cyclone.name: MATTHEW
cyclone.current_location: about 70 mi SSE of Savannah, Georgia and 115 mi SSW of Charleston, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving northward, expected to curve toward the north-northeast then northeast, skirting the coasts of Georgia, South Carolina and southern North Carolina
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or over the South Carolina coast (close to Charleston)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch north of Surf City NC to Cape Lookout NC
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning north of Fernandina Beach FL to Surf City NC; Tropical Storm Warning north of Surf City NC to Duck NC, Pamlico & Albemarle Sounds, and north of Flagler/Volusia county line FL to Fernandina Beach FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northeast coast of Florida, Georgia coast, South Carolina coast, and southern North Carolina coast
weather_observation.wind: Only residual breezy conditions with occasional gusts below tropical-storm force expected; strongest core winds have moved north of the port.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor water rises (generally less than 2 ft) possible along the immediate Broward County shoreline.
weather_observation.rainfall: Additional rainfall generally less than 1 inch; heavy rain threat has shifted north.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Persistent high surf and dangerous rip currents may continue for another day.
